revised_title: Guy Anstruther Knox Marshall: A Pioneering Entomologist and Founder of Modern Applied Entomology
tldr: Guy Anstruther Knox Marshall was a distinguished entomologist who made significant contributions to the field of applied entomology. Despite having no formal scientific education, he founded the Bulletin of Entomological Research and the Review of Applied Entomology, and played a crucial role in the development of modern entomological research and its practical applications.
